div.div:
Calculated BMI
BMI is calculated based on input from Height and Weight

div.title: Computed adherence is calculated based on information from the last refill visit note. If 'Pills left' is entered, the formula is: (Pills provided last visit - Pills Left) divided by Pills that should have been taken. If 'Pills left is not filled out but 'Pills missed' is, then the formula is (Pills that should have been taken - Pills Missed) divided by Pills that should have been taken.
